basic.floral_language:
Aeonium arboreum 'Atropureum'
Floriography: mysterious, beautiful, strong.
The tree aeonium is succulent plant with treelike stem. Rosette ordered leaves are dark purple, wide oval, thin, leathery and toothed at edges. Leaves turn into green if not sunbath well. It is very popular because of shape and color of the leaves.
The plant requires sunny habitat. It will go through dormancy in summer and should be remove from direct sunlight to a place with scattered light. Small blooms are yellow if flowered.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color black purple, without adequate e sunlight, leaves turning to green

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, relatively resistant to half shade, short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring, autumn, and winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
